casebody.data:
No. 10-540 (R46-008). Adelphia Recovery Trust, Petitioner v. Bank of America, N.A., et al. 562 U.S. 1126, 131 S. Ct. 896,

178 L. Ed. 2d 586,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 1. January 5, 2011.

The petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit in the above-entitled case was dismissed today pursuant to this Court’s Rule 46.

Same case below, 379 Fed. Appx. 10.
